name: burger-sequelize
description: [EAT-DA-BURGER](https://bh-burger.herokuapp.com/) is web app that allows you to 'order' burgers and 'devour' them. ## Getting Started Go to [EAT-DA-BURGER](https://bh-burger.herokuapp.com/) to find the app.  - Type the name of a burger into the input field.
